problem.p: For random variable \(X\) in sample space \(\Omega = \{1,2,...,100\}\), we have \(P(X = i) = i/K\) for all \(i\in\Omega\).

ul.li: For events \(E_1=\{\text{integer divisible by }3\}\) and \(E_2=\{\text{integer divisible by }5\}\), what is \(|E_1|\) and \(|E_2|\)?

problem.label: \(|E_1|=\)
\(|E_2|=\)
\(P(E_1)=\)
\(P(E_2)=\)

ul.li: What is \(P(X\text{ not divisible by }3\text{ or }5)\)?
